up678526.sums.bus

Class PersonService

  • java.lang.Object
    • up678526.sums.bus.PersonService

  • public class PersonService
extends java.lang.Object
    provides user focused functionality including user creation, validation of user credentials. Also, provides functionality for users to select ideas.
